column5: BCLI Any info on ASL team meeting with Whitehouse

BCLI on another note id love to see this company succeed in stock price because if i yield a high return i plan to help with an ALS patients treatment from the gains of BCLI that would be the ultimate return on investment for me personally

BCLI personally feel were on the brink of something big as some people have mentioned ill admit i didnt know much about the filing but its being used as an ATM filing is a great way to raise money without debt lets not forget the company is debt free and management is keeping it that way which is great in my opinion weve all been patient for this long just hold a little longer Chaim has millions of his own money in the company so itll be in his best financial interest to succeed which i believe they will just need to be patient a statement from the company would go a long way but it might the same as weve seen before in terms of them wanting to stay focused on P3 ALS i dont expect a huge overnight stock increase but im excited to see what the next month or two brings
BCLI in case you missed it heres the live stream from yesterday and if youre interested in watching youtubecomwatchvfPhwgMX
